item.title: About Daniel Palstra
item.description: Hi, my name is Daniel Palstra. I’m a freelance DevOps Engineer living in the Netherlands. I like to deliver cool IT solutions that help my clients win! My fields of expertise rely in DevOps engineering, cloud solutions and API integration. Current Asignment I am currently active at the Dutch National Police in the role of Cloud Engineer. Clients I have worked for several organisations over the past years. Find a list of them on my linkedin page
